name: Avid Bin File
summary: Learn about .AVB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AVB files are "pointer files" that organize files used by a certain project, but do not contain the actual media. Therefore, when backing up an Avid project, AVB files must be backed up along with the corresponding media files.
Avid bin files can be imported into an existing project by selecting Fileâ†’Import and choosing an AVB file.

description: Library or "bin" of files used by an Avid video-editing project; stores references to media clips, sub-clips, sequences, titles, effects, EQ templates, etc.
